QAData.question: Who won between Southampton and Chelsea on Tue, 30 Aug 2022 18:45:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Southampton won 2–1 over Chelsea on Tue, 30 Aug 2022 18:45:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Thiago Silva completed the most passes (70) in the match.
Raheem Sterling is the most fouled player in the match (4 times).
Mohamed Elyounoussi was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.16.
James Ward-Prowse lost the most duels (12) in the match.
Che Adams created the most chances (3) in the match.
Edouard Mendy is the most accurate passer (100%) in the match.
Ibrahima Diallo has the least touches (33) of any outfield player.
